model.python3_template:
#!/bin/python3

import sys

def bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar):
    # Complete this function

n, k = input().strip().split(' ')
n, k = [int(n), int(k)]
ar = list(map(int, input().strip().split(' ')))
b = int(input().strip())
result = bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar)
print(result)
model.name: Bon Appétit
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin", "r");
function bonAppetit($n, $k, $b, $ar) {
    // Complete this function
}

fscanf($handle, "%i %i", $n, $k);
$ar_temp = fgets($handle);
$ar = explode(" ",$ar_temp);
$ar = array_map('intval', $ar);
fscanf($handle, "%i",$b);
$result = bonAppetit($n, $k, $b, $ar);
echo $result . "\n";

?>
model.python_template:
#!/bin/python

import sys

def bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar):
    # Complete this function

n, k = raw_input().strip().split(' ')
n, k = [int(n), int(k)]
ar = map(int, raw_input().strip().split(' '))
b = int(raw_input().strip())
result = bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar)
print(result)
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

def bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar)
    # Complete this function
end

n, k = gets.strip.split(' ')
n = n.to_i
k = k.to_i
ar = gets.strip
ar = ar.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
b = gets.strip.to_i
result = bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar)
puts result;
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    n_temp <- getLine
    let n_t = words n_temp
    let n = read $ n_t!!0 :: Int
    let k = read $ n_t!!1 :: Int
    ar_temp <- getLine
    let ar = map read $ words ar_temp :: [Int]
    b_temp <- getLine
    let b = read b_temp :: Int

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Determine whether or not Brian overcharged Anna for their split bill.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
        let [
          n_temp (read-line) 
          n_t (split n_temp #"\s+") 
          n (Integer/parseInt (n_t 0)) 
          k (Integer/parseInt (n_t 1)) 
        ]

      (
        let [
          ar_temp (read-line) 
          ar_t (split ar_temp #"\s+") 
          ar (map #(Integer/parseInt %) ar_t) 
        ]
      )

      (
        let [
          b_t (read-line) 
          b (Integer/parseInt b_t) 
        ]
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [N,K]} = io:fread("", "~d~d"),
    Ar = read_array(N,"~d"),
    { ok, [B]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
function bonAppetit(n, k, b, ar)
    -- Complete this function

n,k = io.read("*number", "*number", "*l")
ar = {}
ar_temp = io.read()
ar_i = 1
for token in string.gmatch(ar_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	ar[ar_i] = token
	ar_i = ar_i + 1
end
b = io.read("*number", "*l")
